output_list.criticism: The mintToken function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The freezeAccount function allows the owner to freeze an arbitrary user's account, which can be used to create a permanent ban.
The setPrices function has an integer overflow that allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value.
The buy function always calls the safeContract.sell function, which can be arbitrary and potentially disastrous.
The sell function always generates random numbers, which can be a potential source of weakness.
